gameDetails.name: Rum & Bones: Mercenaries Promos Set #1
gameDetails.description:
An exclusive Mercenary characters pack available only to Rum & Bones Kickstarter backers. Includes 5 miniatures and hero cards.

Included heroes: Captain Blackbeard, Mister Cuddles (Swashbuckler), Handsome Jack (Quartermaster), Dudley the Duelist (Gunner), and Leopold, the Cleaver of Cordova (Brute).
